name: Drip Sort Puzzle
description:
Drip Sort Puzzle is a color sort puzzle game. It's so funny and challenging that you won't be able to put it aside.

Sort the same color drop balls into the tubes then they will burst into colored water. Let's see how smart you are in the game.

HOW TO PLAY:
· The rule is that you can only move a drop ball on top of another ball if both of them have the same color and the tube you want to move into has enough space
· You can always restart the level at any time or retrace your steps one by one using the back button
· If you get stuck during the game that you can add a tube to make it easier

Come on, just challenge this game and enjoy it!
